title: Zombies & Ghosts - Sound Effects
description: 181 High quality audio files for your Zombie and Ghosts
longDescription:
Hello Dev!


This pack will provide you with lots of sounds for your zombies and ghosts! it was designed for games that have these two creatures as enemies and need to sound them.


The sound effects were created to be subtle and serve their purpose without the player noticing, ensuring the player's total immersion in the game.


It's worth remembering that I name the files according to the visual reference I used to create them, but I'm sure you can use it in many other scenarios, it's worth taking a few minutes to listen. :)


With various types of gore and ghostly whooshes, I'm sure some of the sounds will come in handy if you're making a game that has enemies in this style.


And by investing in this package you take all that and still help me to continue creating quality sound effects at a super cool price!


Check the preview

Check the documentation

This bundle is now part of this Bundle:

Horror Bundle - Sound Effects in Sound Effects - UE Marketplace (unrealengine.com)


Don't worry! This package will still receive updates :)
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 181

Number of Audio Cues: 181

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) no

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Documentation: Check the documentation

Important/Additional Notes: The recorder used for the sounds is the H4N pro, and the image is distributed free of charge for commercial use by pixabay.
